sentences.sentence: The effects of hexanedioic acid, sebacic acid and oxalic acid on floatation performance of feldspar and quartz were investigated.
sentences.translation: 研究了己二酸，癸二酸和草酸对长石和石英浮选性能的影响。

sentences.sentence: Biotite (hornblende) two-feldspar gneiss and (5) Fault br.
sentences.translation: 黑云(角闪)二长片麻岩和(5)碎裂岩等。

sentences.sentence: Color is an important indicator to identify potash feldspar.
sentences.translation: 颜色是鉴别钾长石的一个重要标志。
